actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-155.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 399 - 0 (Record Vote No: 92).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1257) to authorize appropriations to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for research and development, construction of facilities, and research and program management, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1257 (NASA funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1257) to authorize appropriations to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for research and development, construction of facilities, and research and program management, and for other purposes.
